short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid impulse purchase and make sure you are buying something you actually need

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avoid buying things that you don't need!

This extension will temporarily disable the "buy" button on:

- Amazon
- eBay
- Walmart

For a period of time depending on the price of the item(s) you want to purchase. The more expensive the item(s) are the longer you'll have to wait. This way you can cool down and really think about the purchase, do you really need to buy it?
